channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Extension Lynmouth Road N16 no cleaned, 10th December
item.description:
The pavement and gutter of the extension of Lynmouth Road N16 have not been street cleaned for at least two weeks. The South side is particularly bad due to blow down from supermarket. Should be cleaned Mon, Wed, Fri .This is not happening.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldhill Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is an abandoned silver car on Longton Grove on the road opposite number 36, 10th December
item.description:
There is an abandoned car without license plates on Longton Grove. It has been there for about 1 month.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Longton Grove, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Moped without reg plates (presumed abandoned), 10th December
item.description:
Moped without reg plates not moved in months and is damaged looks like it's been in an accident. It's been left on the pavement for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trinity Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Graffiti on Listed building, 10th December
item.description:
Someone has graffiti'd the side of this property. It is a listed building in a conservation area and has been there for several weeks. The concern is that it sets a precedent for encouraging graffiti on other buildings around the neighbourhood.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dericote Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping in alleyway between dale road and ridge way, 10th December
item.description:
There is lots of paint pots some empty and some full of paint in alleyway between dale road and ridge way, houses 50-52. please can someone collect these asap as residents are concerned someone may open these and pour the contents everywhere.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dale Road, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Commercial Waste, 10th December
item.description:

item.title: 6 x broken paving slabs between fire exit doorsPetrie / Ruegg exit and bus stop G Nightingale Palace, 10th December
item.description:

item.title: Paving slab broken on stairs, 10th December
item.description:
This paving slab has been broken for around 18 months. It has been reported several times and still unresolved. Disabled,elderly and children use these stairs regularly and it is very dangerous.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Raglan Road, Plumstead

item.title: Roadworks have blocked all access to my property, 10th December
item.description:
Open reach works have completely shut off all access to my property. Entry to the driveway and pathway has been closed off by barriers and pavement has been dug up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Havelock Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Overgrown foliage and rubbish, 10th December
item.description:
This foliage has been here several years and is getting worse to the point that it is a struggle to go past. There has now been a rubbish bin dumped underneath it. I am concerned more rubbish will be dumped here and as a disabled person I worry about falling over trying to get past.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Raglan Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
